text:
@realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends So, is Trump's plan to let millions of americans die due to no Covid-19 containment strategy meant to ease the burden?

Is taking away the Affordable Care Act in court supposed to keep our hospitals in tip top shape by killing all the people who need it most?
